tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you, Ms. Asha Shanbag, for your wonderful assistance in helping my wife and me welcome a healthy baby. Your support has been invaluable from the very first day we began visiting you. Your gentle demeanor and friendly smile have been key aspects of your approach.

She explains every stage of baby development which gives parents a clear idea on what to expect and what not.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Will start the review by thanking Doctor. We have had good experience consulting the doctor , she always listened to our doubts/queries/concerns and clarified them. Quite friendly and positive vibe . Only downside we had with their reception and when we gave feedback to doctor she considered it. If they can improve the reception and lab stuffs it will be amazing as Doctor is already best. She understand the patients well and make sure that she gives all the required information. Thank you again Doctor for being there for us, we will always be grateful.
She was very polite and professional and made me feel comfortable . I would prefer visiting her for all my future gynac issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was not a pleasant experience visiting the clinic. Also, if you are visiting Dr. Asha at this clinic, you will be making the wrong choice as she works at two places and you might not get her full attention. On top of that you will be wasting money at two places for the same person. 

***** *** ******* ***** ****** *** ****** *************** They have just one person to work as nurse and receptionist both. Sometimes it becomes difficult to convey your message to the receptionist. ** *** **** ** ******* ***** *** ****** *** ****** ** ***** **** ******* ** **** ***** ******* ** ********* **** ****** **** ** *** ****** you need to pay a visit and look for the parking space as they have opened their shop without getting any parking space. They tell their customers that the parking is not their headache. If you have any issue with parking, speak to BBMP( suggested by Dr. Asha). ***** *** ***** *** * ** **** **** ***** ************** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted the doctor through a video consultation. She was extremely friendly and professional. There was a disconnection during the consultation, but the doctor made sure to call me back and explained everything regarding the diagnosis. Such gems are rare to find in the medical field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I consulted Dr Asha Shanbhag for a pregnancy related consultation during which I was diagnosed with a cyst/fibroid mass which eventually had to be removed through the laparoscopic procedure. The entire phase starting from the diagnosis to the removal was very smooth and the way Dr. Asha handled the process, explaining and talking me through the complete phase  with how the cyst develops in the body, what could be the possible complications going forward and the need to remove the cyst. She was very friendly throughout spending enough time with me ensuring I was completely normal, did not have any apprehensions regarding the cyst or the laparoscopic procedure. Once the procedure was complete, she would follow-up regularly asking if I was all normal and ensured I did not face any post-op complications. 

After meeting and speaking to Dr Asha it was all encouraging and I was at comfort to go ahead with the procedure. Thank you ma'am for all your support.
reply_text: We Thank you for your valuable feedback

review: One of the highly recommended gynecologist and I am really blessed to have a such doctor who took lot of care towards my pregnancy period. review: I was diagnosed with Placenta previa during 7th month of my secnd pregnancy. Being an experienced doctor in this field, Dr Asha made sure that we were aware of all of the possible developments, treatment paths and operative options. She was very patient and explained everything in minutest of details. We opted to get the surgery done at Manipal hospital by Dr. Asha. She handled the critical c-section procedure very efficiently and she made sure that post-operative care and follow ups were diligently done. I delivered a healthy baby on 22nd September,2021. I strongly recommend her consultation and guidance for any kind of gynaecological/pregnancy issues.

review:
Doctor is very experienced and as a patient I was able to feel the same starting from the first interaction which I made with Dr. Asha Shanbhag. She explained each and every information and the associated medical reasons behind it for any questions raised. It was a Normal delivery. Overall It took almost 17 hours for the whole pregnancy process starting from building pregnancy pain and delivery. These hours were very critical but she gave me strength and handled the things in the coolest way.

She was always polite from the day 1 of pregnancy, even during delivery in the delivery room and after post pregnancy checkups till today.

She is always reachable.

review:
consulted for Abnormal bleeding, FIBROID uterus and Laparoscopy Hysterectomy

I am from Andhra and was new in the city.I used to suffer from heavy bleeding and severe pain during periods due to the big fibroid in my uterus.I had met many gynecologist for this, and every time my fear only increased. I met Dr Asha Madam at Narayana Hospital, through one of my friends. On my first meeting itself the Professionalism, Knowledge and Confidence she exhibited was unmatchable. There was no looking back after that. Asha Ma'am performed my Laparoscopy Hysterectomy, she was very supportive during and after the surgery. Dr Asha is one of the best gynecologist and above all a very good human being. She is now the gynecologist for all my family members and friends.

review:
Dr Asha Shanbagh very special doctor i have met. She is extremely good at what she does. Right from the start she guided us with the best and finally helped us with our delivery of baby boy on March 1st. One of the best doctors to consult with. Previously i had miscarriage and direct DnC was done in "Life hospital" which was not completed cleaned and treated well there. I went through so much pain bleeding for more than a month. Later i met her and she gave some medicines to cleanse uterus. After 3 months I got pregnant again.Right from the beginning she was supportive. She don't prescribe much medicines. She asks us to compensate with home foods only most of the times.

Dr.Asha was so supportive throughout pregnancy stages and mainly at the time of delivery.

Thanks a lot doctor for everything. We are more happy than ever now with our little prince. This happiness means a lot for us now..
reply_text: We thank you for your valuable feedback

review:
After consulting various doctors, we met Dr Asha Shanbhag, at Narayana Hospital after our friend referred us to her. She was very understanding and cooperative. her way of talking brought back our hopes. I was treated for PCOS and infertility. she examines very well, analyses how our body reacts to the medicine and makes sure no medicine is given unnecessarily. I finally conceived after 3 long years of wait, and had a successful normal vaginal delivery with madam.
All thanks to Dr Asha, for making us feel positive during our entire journey.
reply_text: We Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I first started consulting Doctor Asha ever since I had irregular periods and since then till date she has been my go-to doctor for all my gynac related issues. What started for me with irregular period cycles turned into endometriosis which required a laproscopic surgery and then unable to conceive which required iui.Throughout this journey Dr Asha provided the best treatment possible and always gave the right health tips and explained my body and health conditions at every stage which provided tremendous support to me. She was there right throughout my pregnancy and delivery. Her way of accessing the health condition and taking decisions regarding the treatment at the right time has been her greatest strengths. I would strongly recommend her for all your gynac related issues..
reply_text: We Thank you for your valuable feedback.

review:
Met her for  recurrent abortion, pregnancy checkup and delivery.  ** **** **** ** *** **** ************ *** ************* ** **** **** Finding madam was a blessing for us.i write our experience because the fact that you are reading this is because you are in search for the best gynecologist and you have reached the right place.
Being a high risk pregnancy me and my wife were very  worried because my wife had 4 abortions before and now added to that she had developed BP also. But after meeting madam all worries and uncertainties were gone. Madam never made us realise that it is not possible. Now,after 10 years of marriage we are celebrating the arrival of our prince. Thank you madam.

I visited Dr Asha Shanbhag for my first delivery in cloudnine hospital. As it was my first pregnancy I was more concerned about my health.during each visit bshe made me more positive and comfortable. She was very friendly. She made my journey more enjoyable till delivery. Since I was more scared asked for sec C can be done. From starting of checking up with her she always suggested n guided me for normal delivery due to its multiple advantages. Now I'm blessed with Baby Boy. My champ is all fine n healthy. We shall be forever grateful to her... Another important part during the pandemic time when the lockdown was going on, she was available either through video consultation or physical (alternative days). Such a memorable experience... Thank you so much for ur support Dr Asha and team cloudnine...
